description: This file contains implementation of the PostMortem function within the WPEFramework's PluginHost namespace. The function manages the process of generating post-mortem dumps for services, either for internal plugins by dumping system files or for external connections by triggering remote post-mortem procedures.

classes.name: Server
classes.description: A class within WPEFramework::PluginHost that contains the PostMortem static method.

methods.name: void PostMortem(Service & service,const IShell::reason why,RPC::IRemoteConnection * connection)
methods.description: Static method that initiates a post-mortem dump, either locally or via a remote connection, depending on the context.

ctags.name: PostMortem
ctags.pattern: /^\/* static *\/ void Server::PostMortem(Service& service, const IShell::reason why, RPC::IRemoteC/
